name: Lethal Position
description:
It was a simple task: go collect your friend’s stuff from their ex’s place. You weren’t supposed to evade. You weren’t supposed to pry. And, you definitely weren’t supposed to place yourself in this dangerous position. But, you just couldn’t help yourself. Explore a dilapidated apartment reeked with secrets as you solve puzzles to uncover the downfall behind this toxic relationship…

Contributors

3D Art- Sedi

Music & Sfx- FutureYou

Programming- Warspiteful

Writing- Martha

Made for 2021 Husky Game Jam
